title: Type is #1 at the NYT - just for a moment
content:
This is the most popular article, 1:20 pm EST, Tuesday Nov 17th 2009

[http://www.nytimes.com/2009/11/16/arts/16iht-design16.html?\_r=1&em](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131065019/http:/www.nytimes.com/2009/11/16/arts/16iht-design16.html?_r=1&em "http://www.nytimes.com/2009/11/16/arts/16iht-design16.html?\_r=1&em")
author: Eben Sorkin

comments.content:
That's because every Typophile from [this other thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131065019/http:/typophile.com/node/64268) is going there to read it.

(Not to mention all the folks I know who keep forwarding the silly thing to me.)
